Summary: saw a alien looking at me and my mate,on a path
trends: There has been one other sighting in Basildon
There were no other sightings in Basildon on or around September 10th 1977
divs: Sighting Detailslooked up and saw a alien dressed in a black jump out fit, with a very big helmet. by the time i looked at my mate and saw him looking at the alien as well,and turned my head back it had gone.
